name: Gmail - Add labels to toolbar icons
description:
Override the mystery meat navigation in the new Gmail UI. Adds text labels back in alongside the Gmail icons.

Recommended:
http://userstyles.org/styles/56063/gmail-easy-access-colored-buttons Gmail Easy Access Colored Buttons

EDIT:
Gmail now has an option to switch the standalone icons to text (Hurrah!), but this userstyle is still useful if you want both - keep the icons enabled on Gmail, and this userstyle will add the labels alongside the icons.
additional_info:
First userstyle submitted (through frustration with the mystery meat), so it's quick and dirty. Not yet tested in all browsers, just Win Chrome and FF8 (as of 09/12/11).  Only tested on desktop, no tablets or mobile devices.

If it works fine in you os/browser of choice let me know, or you want to send me any amends, you should be able to work out my email address :)

/* Update September 2018 */
Styles updated to work with Gmail's new look. Changes include new labels, making the bold highlights slightly less bold, and removing highlight circles.
